data.title: Jillian Penkin on LinkedIn: Daytime Buffalo: April 23, 2024
data.meta_description: Check out my girl Talia Johnson-Huff, published author, business owner, entrepreneur, women in construction and all around bad a$$! She might be too humble toâ€¦

In the garden of success, community is the water that nurtures growth. ğŸŒ±ğŸ¤ Today, we're focusing on the power of community engagement and how it can transform your brand. Building a community isn't just about gathering followers; it's about cultivating meaningful connections and creating a space where everyone feels valued and heard. To our family of entrepreneurs, we encourage you to engage with your community in ways that matter. Host Q&A sessions, share user-generated content, or create challenges that inspire participation. Every interaction is an opportunity to strengthen bonds and foster loyalty. What initiatives have you taken to engage and grow your community? Share your experiences and tips. Your insights could spark inspiration for someone else! #TogetherWeGrow #CommunityEngagement #BrandCommunity

A lot of coaches and gurus out there don't want you to know this, but I'm spilling the beans... There are no quick-fixes. No hacks, either. (Sorry.) The only quick-fix for your sales is to learn the actual strategies and tools that work for YOU and YOUR dream clients. And then implementing them. Then you'll start seeing results. Then your revenue will start growing. Then sales becomes easy and effortless and aligned. So save your money. Don't spend it on another quick-fix or hacky investment. It's not going to work unless you do THE WORK. PS. Want to get better at sales and have community, accountability and support as you do the work? The She Sells membership is open to founding members for $11/mo through June 18th. In 2.5 weeks, the women inside have already made moves and seen results. DM me for details and founding member bonuses :) #SorryNotSorry #DoTheWork
